name: Mari's Clam Lovers Chowder
author: Mari Stephenson
summary: This is a large amount of clam chowder good for parties or dinners.  It's good served with oyster crackers, hard crust breads, or in sourdough bread bowls.
ingredients: 8 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, drained with juice reserved
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: In a large stockpot, saute bacon until almost crisp
Add clam juice, onion, carrots, water, celery, and parsley
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes
Add potatoes and simmer 20 more minutes
At the time you add potatoes start cream sauce
In a Dutch oven melt butter and add flour; blend until smooth
Slowly pour in cream, stirring constantly
DO NOT BOIL!  When smooth, transfer to the stockpot
Stir in clams, salt, pepper, sugar and red wine vinegar
Simmer, never let boil, until smooth and slightly thickened, about 30 to 45 minutes
